name: Total Eclipse Of The Heart - vol.02
name_original: Total Eclipse Of The Heart - vol.02
description:
A game about a house.

Use WASD, left click and right click.

We strongly advise you to download the game but there is a WebGL version here : https://octostudio.itch.io/total-webgl

Music credits goes to the great wizard Mort Garson.

Made during ludum dare 48
